data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tsukamoto, Sho, Shimano, Satoshi, Murakami, Takashi, Hiruta, Shimpei F., Yamasaki, Takeshi, Eguchi, Katsuyuki (2019): A new species of the genus Arrup from a limestone cave in Akiyoshi-dai, Western Japan (Chilopoda, Geophilomorpha, Mecistocephalidae). ZooKeys 830: 33-51, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.830.33060, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.830.33060
